name: Wendigo
description: The Wendigo is a fearsome medium monstrosity with an aura of starvation and a chilling presence. It attacks using its icy claws and bite, and can project freezing spit at a distance.
memorable: Its Aura of Starvation can paralyze foes, creating a terrifying and tactical combat situation.
goals: To hunt and incapacitate prey using its terrifying abilities.
relations: Usually encountered in cold, mountainous regions, possibly alongside other monstrous creatures.
environment: Cold and snowy areas, often found in desolate landscapes or deep forests.
strengths: Immune to cold and fire damage, advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Relatively low intelligence and charisma scores limit its strategic and social capabilities.
attacks: Employs multiple melee attacks with icy claws inflicting slashing and cold damage, and has a potent ranged attack with Frozen Spittle.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Starvation that can paralyze enemies within proximity.
senses: Possesses darkvision out to 120 feet and has a passive perception of 17, allowing it to detect ambushes easily.
skills: Proficient in athletics, stealth, perception, and survival, making it a formidable predator.
additional_information: Can perform physical feats with great skill.
Capable of ambushing unsuspecting prey effectively.
Maintains resilience against many conventional assaults.
Has the ability to restrain foes from a distance.
A chilling presence that instills fear in its foes.
test_queries: monster with an aura of starvation
creature immune to cold and fire damage
